translation.loadJsonTip: Please select EC site and Scraping type, then click "Load" to load json content.
translation.loadDialogTitle: Are you sure to load the JSON?
translation.testDialogTitle: Are you sure to test the JSON?
translation.saveDialogTitle: Are you sure to save the JSON?

editor.jsDescription:
Please put following placeholders in script as you need. When scraping each placeholder will be replaced with number from 1 for every target element of parent selector in each page.
  • Purchase Order: {orderIndex}
  • Purchase Product: {productIndex}
All placeholders will be placed with 1 when checking with below button.
editor.currentUrlCodePlaceholder: Please replace product code in URL with {code} placeholder so that the placeholder is replaced with each product code when scraping
editor.currentUrlWordPlaceholder: Please replace search word in URL with {word} placeholder so that the placeholder is replaced with each search word when scraping
editor.label: Label

searchProduct.jsDescription:
Please put {productIndex} placeholder in script as you need. When scraping the placeholder will be replaced with number from 1 for target element of parent selector in each page.
It will be placed with 1 when checking with below button.
